content: hello i am new to here. may anyone please explain me , what is a trust network ?  how to build a trust network with other person?? thank you all.                                         Ivartheragnarson

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Here is a guide explaining the trust system:LoyceV's Beginners guide to correct use of the Trust systemAlthough this is a beginner's guide, you may find it a little difficult to understand at first. A trust system is established to make the forum as safe as possible against scams and untrustworthy people.In this forum it consists of two parts, the trust feedbacks and the trust lists. For more information, read the thread I linked.

comments.author: indah rezqi
comments.body: Quote from: Poker Player on August 22, 2022, 05:47:14 AMAlthough this is a beginner's guide, you may find it a little difficult to understand at first. A trust system is established to make the forum as safe as possible against scams and untrustworthy people.I have a simple understanding of how I should trust someone to be on my trust list. Most of the DT1 members can be trusted by me, but not all of them I can trust when I review the reputation they have earned over the years. I trust their reviews especially on cases involving other people's reputations, but I might edit that list if in the future I get something different about them.OP, simply put, trust someone you deem worthy based on their reputation and contributions and it's not limited to trusting someone you know in real life even if they don't trade with you. The problem so far, some users are scratching themselves, has been discussed a lot lately.
